snippet: Nearly 200 comments resulted from an article about subway operators whose trains fatally struck people; some commenters sought preventive steps, but others described their own experiences.
abstract: Nearly 200 comments resulted from an article about subway operators whose trains fatally struck people; some commenters sought preventive steps, but others described their own experiences.

headline.main: Readers Share Own Stories of Death on the Tracks
headline.print_headline: Readers Share Stories Of Deaths on the Tracks
